reviewtext: Mine's been working flawlessly since I bought it in early 2000. I understand the newer models are bus-powered. If for some reason you can't have a power strip, that's a concern, but I do wish the AC adapter was smaller.Gotta love the way it shoots non-Iomega zip disks half way across the room, too!I recommend this drive for low-cost, low demand storage and backup. Now if only zips would come down in price...
summary: Two Years Old and Going Strong
